content:
That's the right attitude! I'm thrilled to hear that you're excited to take your game to the next level. Remember, improvement is a journey, and it's great that you're committed to putting in the work.

By being open-minded, communicative, and focused on the process, you'll be able to get the most out of your lessons and make significant progress. And don't forget to have fun along the way!

It's also awesome that you're thinking about how you can apply what you learn to your weekly doubles league matches with Alex. That's a great way to stay motivated and see the direct impact of your hard work.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. Otherwise, go out there and crush it on the court!

Best of luck with your lessons, and I hope you and Alex have a blast playing together on Thursdays!
